sourcesContent: import { Form, useNavigate, useNavigation, useActionData } from 'react-router-dom'; import classes from './EventForm.module.css'; function EventForm({ method, event }) { console.log(event); const navigate = useNavigate(); const navigation = useNavigation(); // see the progress const isSubmitting = navigation.state === 'submitting'; function cancelHandler() { navigate('..'); } return (
